NEW: Niles High School Biology II Class Visits Mercy Health.

Dr. Frank Beck and Mercy Health Youngstown extended the opportunity to Mrs. Chieffo’s Biology II students to come explore careers in oral health at the Joanie Abdu Center in Youngstown, Ohio. Students watched a presentation describing the five available career opportunities within the oral health field. They were able to ask questions regarding those careers after the presentation. Students then participated in five hands-on sessions where they learned how to place a filling in a tooth, place a dental sealant on a tooth, take vital signs on one another, tour a mobile dental facility, and finally visit with a dental lab technician. Students also participated in an “Alcohol and Other Drugs” program to conclude the day.
